content: **lace piping and short row - oh my ** a few of my favorite features come together in this fresh and flirty sleeveless cropped vest design which also happens to be a great option for springtime wardrobes be sure to check out the video tutorials linked below designed to be worn with approximately 1-2 of positive ease less ease will result in a figure-hugging silhouette more ease will result in a more relaxed fit select a finished size that provides the amount of ease for the fit you desire **finished bust** 34 38 42 46 51 55 **yarn** approx 550 630 670 790 890 980 yards sport weight yarn sample uses knit picks heatherly 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328yds/100g in sweet bing qty 2 2 3 3 3 3 **needles** us 7 4 5mm 32 circular needles or size needed for gauge us 6 4mm 16 & 32 circular needles **notions** tapestry needle stitch holders stitch markers sweater clip **tutorials** make the scallop wrap video 1 how to k1b video 2 knit short row no wrap video 3 join shoulders with 3-needle bind off video 4 1 https //youtu be/qqzqlw6phhi 2 https //youtu be/gl2kcrag1vs 3 https //youtu be/ulehzvppcxu 4 https //youtu be/9mxiccznqdo
